caption.p: Microscopic image of the peanut-shape structure: ( a) after the arc discharge treatment and ( b) after the fusion splicing. Z 1, distance to ellipsoidal-structure section Z 2, length of ellipsoidal-structure section; R, radius of the ellipsoidal-structure section; ( c) schematic diagram of the cascading two waist enlarged structures-MZI (adapted from [ 157]).
